brief: Produce a default _AdaptiveAction_ object for an replace object request to a model adapter.
description: This function returns a _AdaptiveAction_ object for the default action performed if a onReplaceObject parameter is not specified on the associated _AdaptiveModelObjectType_. The action is not performed, but be aware that functions called while producing the _AdaptiveAction_ object may cause side effects. This function can be called as part of a onReplace expression or for testing.

parameters.description: This is the adapterId of a model adapter. Variable custom::adapterId can be used to access this value in model expressions.
parameters.name: adapterId

parameters.description: This is the adaptive object type of object being replaced. Variable custom::objectType can be used to access this value in model expressions.
parameters.name: objectType

parameters.description: The objectId of object to replace. Variable custom::objectId can be used to access this value in model expressions.
parameters.name: objectId

parameters.description: This is the object to replace. Variable custom::object can be used to access this value in model expressions.
parameters.name: object

parameters.description: This specifics a modelId of model to use for producing results. If not specified, the adapter's current model will be used.
parameters.name: modelId

parameters.description: This specifies additional context information available to model expressions.
parameters.name: context
